faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about our services
faq.q1: How long does a standard wash take?
faq.a1: A standard wash usually takes 24 hours. For more specific items like suits, it may take up to 48 hours.
faq.a2: Yes, we offer express service with an additional fee of 50%. Please contact us in advance to make use of this service.
faq.q3: Can I drop off and pick up my laundry at any time?
faq.a3: Our shop is open Monday to Saturday from 8am to 7pm, and Sunday from 10am to 4pm. You can drop off and pick up your laundry during these hours.
faq.q4: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a4: We accept cash, mobile money transfers (Orange Money, Wave), and bank cards for your convenience.

hero.title: About Yessal
hero.subtitle: Discover our story and our commitment to quality and customer service

history.title: Our History
history.content: Founded in 2018 in Thiès, Yessal was born from the vision of offering a professional laundry service of superior quality. Our name, which means 'cleanliness' in Wolof, reflects our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: At Yessal, we are committed to providing exceptional laundry services that exceed our customers' expectations. We invest in state-of-the-art equipment and use environmentally friendly products to ensure perfect results every time.

team.title: Our Team
team.content: Our team consists of experienced and passionate professionals who treat each garment with care and attention. We undergo regular training to stay at the forefront of industry best practices.

service.title: Personalized Service
service.content: Every customer is unique and important to us

value3.title: Integrity
